title: Network Engineer (Level 3 or 4)
full_description: Boecore is seeking a Principal/Sr Principal Network Engineer (Level 3 or 4) to support the Ground-Based Midcourse Defense (GMD) program in Huntsville, AL.Responsibilities:Responsibilities include all aspects of the product design, development, integration, test, and implementation through the Product life cycle for incorporating changes identified by Program personnel. This includes analysis of change requests and requirements for new or upgraded Product capabilities, systems design, COTS/GOTS integration, and procedures needed to meet and mitigate requirements changes. Additionally, the candidate is expected to be able to resolve technically challenging issues and proactively contribute to the evolution of the Product.
